const wxString wxExAlignText ( const wxString &  lines,
const wxString &  header,
bool  fill_out_with_space = false,
bool  fill_out = false,
const wxExLexer &  lexer = wxExLexer() 
)

Aligns text.

Parameters:
lines lines to align
header The header is used as a prefix for the line, directly followed by the lines, and if necessary on the next line the header is repeated as a string of spaces.
fill_out_with_space if fill out, then use space
fill_out fill out
lexer if lexer is specified fills out over lexer comment lines If the lexer has no comment end character, fill out with spaces is not done.
const wxString wxExEllipsed ( const wxString &  text,
const wxString &  control = wxEmptyString 
)

Adds an ellipses after text.

The control, if present is postfixed, after a tab character (for accels).

bool wxExFindOtherFileName ( const wxFileName &  filename,
wxFileName *  lastfile 
)

Finds other filenames from the one specified in the same dir structure.

Results are put on the list if not null, or in the filename if not null.

const wxString wxExGetEndOfText ( const wxString &  text,
size_t  max_chars = 15 
)

If text length exceeds max_chars, returns an ellipse prefix followed by the last max_chars from the text, otherwise just returns the text.

Returns true if filename (fullname) matches one of the fields in specified pattern (fields separated by ; sign).

Opens files.

Opens all files specified by files.

Parameters:
frame frame on which OpenFile for each file is called, and wxExDirOpenFile for each dir
files array with files
file_flags flags to be used with OpenFile
dir_flags flags to be used with wxExDirOpenFile

Executes VCS command id for specified files and opens component if necessary.

Parameters:

id VCS menu id to execute
